title: Amicable55
author: Amicable55
content: Bounty Manger Name CryptopreneurBrainboss https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5408757.0  Bounty Manger Name julerz12 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405804.0

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Please explain to us the purpose of this topic and why you chose only two campaigns to include in your unique list. I doubt you will only list the campaigns you participate in. Over all, the managers of these campaigns are good.I advise you to design a good example of the topic that you can update easily and the information is clear. Unfortunately, your forum rank does not allow you to create tables or even post pictures. It would be better if you work to develop your rank for better posting.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Kavelj22 on August 05, 2022, 04:51:47 PMI advise you to design a good example of the topic that you can update easily and the information is clear. Unfortunately, your forum rank does not allow you to create tables or even post pictures. It would be better if you work to develop your rank for better posting.I think he is trying to make a post with compilation format, but I understand that he is a newbie and cant use such functions on higher rank privilege.OP, if you plan to do what I am thinking above, I believe there are plenty of topics with that already. You can use search function to check on those and have ideas for that. So next time you think of a certain compilation topic you could do that in organized format.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Op, your list doesn't look like a list of active bounties but a list of managers and it will take you a lot of time until you'll be able to merge all of the active bounties.To give you the thought about this thread that you've started. We already have the Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign Managers and there are other threads that were made the same too.For those that have many spare time, you can check their portfolios and list of their active bounties, per manager.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: I will recommend you to lock your topic instead of updating your topic because there's no reason to have active bounties list. Actually visit the bounties section is more better than using your list since I can see who manage the campaign, how many replies and views so far, usually a legit campaign with have higher replies and views. The better thing to do is create a list campaign that will pay the bounty hunters since it's full of scam.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: There's no need to create a new thread. If you wanna list the bounties and there was a thread that already dedicated for such purpose. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400447.0The thread looks rarely updating the new campaign and if you wanna try to create an update and just go to that thread and actively updating about which campaign that has come to the bounty hunters. It will be far better rather than creating this useless thread which was not needed anymore.

If you wanna list the bounties and there was a thread that already dedicated for such purpose. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400447.0The thread looks rarely updating the new campaign and if you wanna try to create an update and just go to that thread and actively updating about which campaign that has come to the bounty hunters. I do know that OP was a newbies and he maybe wanna earn merit from creating the list of campaign. he is not active again. Checking his post history and it seems like OP already forgot if he has ever created this thread. that sounds good if he was learning from what he can learn before.

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Quote from: Amicable55 on August 05, 2022, 12:28:49 PM  Bounty Manger Name CryptopreneurBrainboss https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5408757.0  Bounty Manger Name julerz12 https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405804.0 the term ASAP meaning URGENT but after posting this for 3 weeks without any update or at least post regarding this thread? i think you have just created this to at least Gain Merit from those managers?so you could become at least Member rank , suddenly they did not give any reactions lolbest to bring out new here soon or you'll gain nothing from what you are targeting here .

comments.author: mbakruroh
comments.body: Quote from: Kavelj22 on August 05, 2022, 04:51:47 PMUnfortunately, your forum rank does not allow you to create tables or even post pictures. I think creating a table is not constrained by account ranking, it's just a skill in setting up the BBcode language, and the language is very simple, it just needs a combination. If want to import images, of course, you need a minimum account rank of Jr. Member, or 32 posts with a one month time limit.
